commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Has everyone taken care of their warm-ups?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Readier than I've ever been in my life! The desire for deliciousness is driving my whole body, zura!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You're really excited about this!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Ready when you are. I'm so psyched to take part in a competition like this. I'm not gonna lose!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I will be putting forth my very best efforts as well. I won't lose to any of you!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Maki, make sure you warm-up as well. It's a bit different on there from dry land. It might sway and you might fall down, so please be careful.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Yeah, yeah... I get these are super special limited edition shaved ice and all, but do they really need to get so worked up over them?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You've got an awfully cool head, Maki.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: More like everyone else is too heated over it.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You know, I'm starting to think that maybe you're actually just scared you'll lose.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Excuse me?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You heard Umi. It's much harder out there than on land. You could easily lose your footing with the waves, and it can be slippery on there too.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Just one misstep and you'd fall into the ocean and right into last place. No wonder you're so afraid.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Wh-Who said I was scared?! Fine, I'll show you. Our team will claim first and second place! Just you wait and see!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Chuckle* Let's both do our best.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Line up, everyone. Here we go... Ready, start!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: WOO!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Whoa! Y-You's so quick on her feet!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: It's no surprise that a high-diving athlete would be in her element here!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: But she's not even diving right now.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Hah! Oop! Up I go! *Laugh* This thing is so much fun!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Oh? Looks like the path ends here. Or maybe it's telling me to jump! Ready and... HUP!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Aaaand nailed it! Now, what's next? A tunnel, eh? Whooooa, it's all wet and slippery! Hahaha!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You is flying through the course. She's gonna be tough to beat.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Ack, it's so unsteady and...hard to...run... Zura!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Ah! Hanamaru! Are you okay?! Lemme help...

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: *Gasp* I-I'm fine, zura... Go on without me, You!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: But...!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: You'll fall behind if you come back for me. The most important thing right now is for you to finish the race, zura. It's okay, I promise I'll follow after you. Just go!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Hanamaru...! Okay. Promise me we'll meet again! I believe in you!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I will!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Talk about over-dramatic...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Such a strong and beautiful bond! You, Hanamaru... You may be my rivals, but I hope with all my heart that you will be reunited once again!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Why are you crying over this?!
